Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value for us, but considering its worth to you, we're confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. We're offering this exceptional product to you for $11500. We believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We're eager to hear your response and make this transaction happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
